io.springlets.data.web

Class GlobalSearchHandlerMethodArgumentResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.springlets.data.web.GlobalSearchHandlerMethodArgumentResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.web.method.support.HandlerMethodArgumentResolver

    public class GlobalSearchHandlerMethodArgumentResolver
extends Object
implements org.springframework.web.method.support.HandlerMethodArgumentResolver
    Extracts global search text information from web requests and thus allows injecting GlobalSearch instances into controller methods.
    Author:
    Cèsar Ordiñana at http://www.disid.com[DISID Corporation S.L.]
